item.title: Chalreq [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

I’m not sure what in that code, automatically makes staff yell, have the :chalreq: effect? I didn’t wan’t staff only ::yell, I wanted staff on;y :chalreq: effect when they yell.

Read full topic

item.title: Chalreq [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[code]f (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[The Mighty Boss And Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Hidden Admin]"; 
            } 
 if (playerRights == 0) {
            sM("You need to be a donator to yell");
}
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
            }[/code]

Use that its for donator+

Read full topic

item.title: Chalreq [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

Hello, I was wondering if there was some way to make “:chalreq:” Only useable for staff. I found this annoying as any player can use it, and I could not find a single way of changing this. Also, is there some way to make say… my title, do this automatically when I ::yell?

} if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Owner] "; }

Read full topic
